promise_cpu_temperature_frequency.description: Frequency at which CPU temperature promise will be run (unit: minutes)

promise_cpu_temperature_threshold.description: Temperature threshold above which CPU temperature promise will fail (unit: Celsius)

promise_cpu_avg_temperature_threshold.description: If average temperature over specified duration reaches this threshold, promise will fail (unit: Celsius)

promise_cpu_avg_temperature_threshold_du.description: Duration during which average temperature should not exceed specified threshold (unit: secondes)

promise_ram_available_frequency.description: Frequency at which RAM availalble promise will be run (unit: minutes)

promise_ram_available_threshold.description: Minimum available RAM threshold below which RAM available promise will fail (unit: MB)

promise_ram_avg_available_threshold.description: If average available ram over specified duration reaches this threshold, promise will fail (unit: MB)

promise_ram_avg_available_threshold_dura.description: Duration during which average available RAM shall not be below specified threshold (unit: secondes)

promise_network_errors_frequency.description: Frequency at which network errors promise will be run (unit: minutes)

promise_network_errors_threshold.description: Maximum network errors threshold(per MB) above which the promise will fail (unit: N/A)

promise_network_lost_packets_threshold.description: Maximum network lost packets threshold(per MB) above which the promise will fail (unit: N/A)

promise_network_transit_frequency.description: Frequency at which network transit promise will be run (unit: minutes)

promise_network_transit_max_data_thresho.description: Maximum data amount on network below which the promise will fail (unit: MB)

promise_network_transit_min_data_thresho.description: Minimum data amount on network below which the promise will fail (unit: MB)

promise_network_transit_duration.description: Duration during which data amount on network shall not be above maximum and below minimum (unit: secondes)

promise_cpu_load_frequency.description: Frequency at which CPU load promise will be run (unit: minutes)

promise_cpu_load_threshold.description: Maximum CPU load ratio threshold above which the promise will fail (unit: N/A)

promise_monitor_space_frequency.description: Frequency at which monitor space promise will be run (unit: minutes)

promise_partition_space_threshold.description: Minimum partition space ratio threshold below which the promise will fail (unit: N/A)

promise_free_disk_space_frequency.description: Frequency at which free disk space promise will be run (unit: minutes)

promise_free_disk_space_threshold.description: Minimum partition space ratio threshold below which the promise will fail (unit: N/A)

promise_free_disk_space_nb_days_predicte.description: Number of days (unit: Days) that will be take into account for prediction calculation

promise_free_disk_space_display_partitio.description: Enable partition display by setting boolean to True (unit: N/A)

promise_free_disk_space_display_predicti.description: Enable prediction display by setting boolean to True (unit: N/A)
